verses.verse: Now <S%H2088>this<s%> is the <S%H1293>blessing<s%> with <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> his <S%H4194>death.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> "The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> from <S%H5514>Sinai,<s%> And <S%H2224>dawned<s%> on them from <S%H8165>Seir;<s%> He <S%H3313>shone<s%> <S%H3313>forth<s%> from <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H6290>Paran,<s%> And He <S%H857>came<s%> from the midst of <S%H7233>ten<s%> <S%H7233>thousand<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H6944>ones;<s%> At His <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand<s%> there was <S%H799>flashing<s%> <S%H799>lightning<s%> for them.

<S%H637>"Indeed,<s%> He <S%H2245>loves<s%> the <S%H5971>people;<s%> <S%H3605>All<s%> Thy <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H6918>ones<s%> are in Thy <S%H3027>hand,<s%> And they <S%H8497>followed<s%> in Thy <S%H7272>steps;<s%> [Everyone] <S%H5375>receives<s%> of Thy <S%H1703>words.<s%>
<S%H4872>"Moses<s%> <S%H6680>charged<s%> us with a <S%H8451>law,<s%> A <S%H4181>possession<s%> for the <S%H6952>assembly<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%>

"And He was <S%H4428>king<s%> in <S%H3484>Jeshurun,<s%> When the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> were <S%H622>gathered,<s%> The <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3162>together.<s%>
"May <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> <S%H2421>live<s%> and not <S%H4191>die,<s%> <S%H408>Nor<s%> his <S%H4962>men<s%> be <S%H4557>few.<s%>"

And <S%H2088>this<s%> regarding <S%H3063>Judah;<s%> so he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H8085>"Hear,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> And <S%H935>bring<s%> him to his <S%H5971>people.<s%> With his <S%H3027>hands<s%> he <S%H7378>contended<s%> for them; And mayest Thou be a <S%H5828>help<s%> <S%H4480>against<s%> his <S%H6862>adversaries.<s%>"

And of <S%H3878>Levi<s%> he <S%H559>said,<s%> "[Let] Thy <S%H8550>Thummim<s%> and Thy <S%H224>Urim<s%> [belong] to Thy <S%H2623>godly<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> <S%H834>Whom<s%> Thou didst <S%H5254>prove<s%> at <S%H4532>Massah,<s%> With whom Thou didst <S%H7378>contend<s%> at the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H4809>Meribah;<s%>

Who <S%H559>said<s%> of his father and his <S%H1>mother,<s%> 'I did not <S%H517>consider<s%> them'; And he did not <S%H7200>acknowledge<s%> his <S%H5234>brothers,<s%> <S%H251>Nor<s%> did he <S%H3808>regard<s%> his own <S%H3045>sons,<s%> For they <S%H1121>observed<s%> Thy <S%H8104>word,<s%> And <S%H565>kept<s%> Thy <S%H5341>covenant.<s%>

"They shall <S%H3384>teach<s%> Thine <S%H4941>ordinances<s%> to <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> And Thy <S%H8451>law<s%> to <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> They shall <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H6988>incense<s%> <S%H639>before<s%> Thee, And <S%H3632>whole<s%> <S%H3632>burnt<s%> <S%H3632>offerings<s%> on Thine <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

"O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H1288>bless<s%> his <S%H2428>substance,<s%> And <S%H7521>accept<s%> the <S%H6467>work<s%> of his <S%H3027>hands;<s%> <S%H4272>Shatter<s%> the <S%H4975>loins<s%> of those who <S%H6965>rise<s%> up against him, And those who <S%H8130>hate<s%> him, <S%H4480>so<s%> that they may not <S%H6965>rise<s%> [again.]"

Of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> he <S%H559>said,<s%> "May the <S%H3039>beloved<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in <S%H983>security<s%> by Him, Who <S%H2653>shields<s%> him <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>day,<s%> And he <S%H7931>dwells<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> His <S%H3802>shoulders.<s%>"

And of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1288>"Blessed<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> [be] his <S%H776>land,<s%> With the <S%H4022>choice<s%> <S%H4022>things<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> with the <S%H2919>dew,<s%> And from the <S%H8415>deep<s%> <S%H7257>lying<s%> <S%H8478>beneath,<s%>
And with the <S%H4022>choice<s%> <S%H8393>yield<s%> of the <S%H8121>sun,<s%> And with the <S%H4022>choice<s%> <S%H1645>produce<s%> of the <S%H3391>months.<s%>

"And with the <S%H7218>best<s%> <S%H7218>things<s%> of the <S%H6924>ancient<s%> <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> And with the <S%H4022>choice<s%> <S%H4022>things<s%> of the <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H1389>hills,<s%>

And with the <S%H4022>choice<s%> <S%H4022>things<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> and its <S%H4393>fulness,<s%> And the <S%H7522>favor<s%> of Him who <S%H7931>dwelt<s%> in the <S%H5572>bush.<s%> Let it <S%H935>come<s%> to the <S%H7218>head<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> And to the <S%H6936>crown<s%> of the <S%H6936>head<s%> of the <S%H5139>one<s%> <S%H5139>distinguished<s%> among his <S%H251>brothers.<s%>

"As the first-born of his <S%H7794>ox,<s%> <S%H1926>majesty<s%> is his, And his <S%H7161>horns<s%> are the <S%H7161>horns<s%> of the <S%H7214>wild<s%> <S%H7214>ox;<s%> With them he shall <S%H5055>push<s%> the <S%H5971>peoples,<s%> <S%H9191>All<s%> at <S%H9191>once,<s%> [to] the <S%H657>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%> And <S%H1992>those<s%> are the <S%H7233>ten<s%> <S%H7233>thousands<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> And <S%H1992>those<s%> are the <S%H505>thousands<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh.<s%>"
And of <S%H2074>Zebulun<s%> he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H8055>"Rejoice,<s%> <S%H2074>Zebulun,<s%> in your <S%H3318>going<s%> <S%H3318>forth,<s%> And, <S%H3485>Issachar,<s%> in your <S%H168>tents.<s%>

"They shall <S%H7121>call<s%> <S%H5971>peoples<s%> [to] the <S%H2022>mountain;<s%> <S%H8033>There<s%> they shall <S%H2076>offer<s%> <S%H6664>righteous<s%> <S%H2077>sacrifices;<s%> For they shall <S%H3243>draw<s%> out the <S%H8228>abundance<s%> of the <S%H3220>seas,<s%> And the <S%H2934>hidden<s%> <S%H5603>treasures<s%> of the <S%H2344>sand.<s%>"

And of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1288>"Blessed<s%> is the one who <S%H7337>enlarges<s%> <S%H1410>Gad;<s%> He <S%H7931>lies<s%> <S%H7931>down<s%> as a <S%H3833>lion,<s%> And <S%H2963>tears<s%> the <S%H2220>arm,<s%> <S%H637>also<s%> the <S%H6936>crown<s%> of the <S%H6936>head.<s%>

"Then he <S%H7200>provided<s%> the <S%H7225>first<s%> [part] for himself, For <S%H8033>there<s%> the ruler's <S%H2513>portion<s%> was <S%H5603>reserved;<s%> And he <S%H857>came<s%> [with] the <S%H7218>leaders<s%> of the <S%H5971>people;<s%> He <S%H6213>executed<s%> the <S%H6666>justice<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> And His <S%H4941>ordinances<s%> with <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>"
And of <S%H1835>Dan<s%> he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1835>"Dan<s%> is a lion's <S%H1482>whelp,<s%> That <S%H2187>leaps<s%> forth from <S%H1316>Bashan.<s%>"

And of <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%> he <S%H559>said,<s%> "O <S%H5321>Naphtali,<s%> <S%H7649>satisfied<s%> with <S%H7522>favor,<s%> And <S%H4392>full<s%> of the <S%H1293>blessing<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H3423>Take<s%> <S%H3423>possession<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> and the <S%H1864>south.<s%>"

And of <S%H836>Asher<s%> he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4480>"More<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> is <S%H836>Asher;<s%> May he be <S%H7521>favored<s%> by his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> And may he <S%H2881>dip<s%> his <S%H7272>foot<s%> in <S%H8081>oil.<s%>
"Your <S%H4515>locks<s%> shall be <S%H1270>iron<s%> and <S%H5178>bronze,<s%> And according to your <S%H3117>days,<s%> so shall your <S%H1679>leisurely<s%> <S%H1679>walk<s%> be.

<S%H369>"There<s%> is <S%H369>none<s%> like the <S%H410>God<s%> of <S%H3484>Jeshurun,<s%> Who <S%H7392>rides<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> to your <S%H5828>help,<s%> And through the <S%H7834>skies<s%> in His <S%H1346>majesty.<s%>

"The <S%H6924>eternal<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> is a <S%H4585>dwelling<s%> <S%H4585>place,<s%> And <S%H8478>underneath<s%> are the <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H2220>arms;<s%> And He <S%H1644>drove<s%> out the <S%H340>enemy<s%> from <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> you, And <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H8045>'Destroy!<s%>'

"So <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7931>dwells<s%> in <S%H983>security,<s%> The <S%H9407>fountain<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H910>secluded,<s%> In a <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1715>grain<s%> and <S%H8492>new<s%> <S%H8492>wine;<s%> His <S%H8064>heavens<s%> <S%H637>also<s%> <S%H6201>drop<s%> <S%H6201>down<s%> <S%H2919>dew.<s%>

<S%H835>"Blessed<s%> are you, O <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> <S%H4310>Who<s%> is <S%H3644>like<s%> you, a <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3467>saved<s%> by the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> Who is the <S%H4043>shield<s%> of your <S%H5828>help,<s%> And the <S%H2719>sword<s%> of your <S%H1346>majesty!<s%> So your <S%H340>enemies<s%> shall <S%H3584>cringe<s%> before you, And you shall <S%H1869>tread<s%> upon their <S%H1116>high<s%> <S%H1116>places.<s%>"
